NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Nuclear and Consumption or the cell corresponding to Renewables and Investment?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Renewables} and {Investment} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Electricity and Efficiency or the cell corresponding to Transmission and Production?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Transmission} and {Production} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.46 to 0.50?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Exploration, Investment), (Renewables, Policy), (Water, Storage)}.
